entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, 3.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. John's Int'l Airport 08:30 AM NDT Monday 02 May 2016
Condition: Mainly Sunny
Temperature: 3.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 71 %
Dewpoint: -1.4°C
Wind: NE 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Clearing. High 9 except plus 4 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Clearing this morning. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. High 9 except plus 4 along parts of the coast. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 06:38 AM NDT Monday 02 May 2016

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 06:38 AM NDT Monday 02 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain mixed with snow. High 6 except plus 2 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon then rain at times mixed with snow. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 6 except plus 2 along parts of the coast. Forecast issued 06:38 AM NDT Monday 02 May 2016
